attributes.action: follow the act of the Republic Of Ireland and introduce a compulsory tax on usage of carrier bags
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a time where global awareness on reusing recyclable materials I think it would be a good idea for the government to introduce a bag tax as soon as possible. In the Republic Of Ireland where consumers are charged for carrier bags, usage for new bags has fallen by 90%. Please sign my petition to encourage the government to introduce a compulsory 10p per bag charge and to do so as soon as possible

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
